devdoc.details: Used for external transfers. Adaptation of ERC-1155 that uses AppStorage and aligns with Nayms ACL implementation.      https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/tree/master/contracts/token/ERC1155

externalDeposit(address,uint256).details: Deposit from msg.sender to their associated entity

externalWithdrawFromEntity(bytes32,addre.details: Withdraw from entity to an external account

params._entityId: Internal ID of the entity the user is withdrawing from
params._receiverId: Internal ID of the account receiving the funds

devdoc.title: Token Vault IO

externalDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit funds into msg.sender's Nayms platform entity
